segments.text: I'm not comfortable about this , Sandy . I don't understand most of these games .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's okay . I can explain a little .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want to lose all my money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . You can't lose all your money.because you won't gamble all your money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course I'm right . I already told you the rule for Las Vegas . Remember ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I remember.You must decide how much money you will gamble before you start to play .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . That's the best way to have control over yourself.You say to yourself . Tonight I will gamble fifty dollars . Only fifty dollars . No more.If you follow the rule , you can't lose more than fifty dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know it's true , Sandy . But still some people lose control.They start to gamble , and they can't stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I won't let you do that . I will watch you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So how much do you want to gamble ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 500 dollars ! That's too much ! You just said you are afraid to lose your money.If you're afraid , why do you want to gamble 500 dollars ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want people to think I'm stingy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is a bad attitude to have , Karen ! If you think that way , Las Vegas will be really dangerous for you .
segments.speaker: S2
